availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Preston L. Bland (Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer. Kentucky native. Son of John B. Bland and Ann Bland. Married to Maria Jane Chenowith Bland in Louisville, Kentucky, on September 24, 1863. Resident of Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned five enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Attended Hanover College in Jefferson County, Indiana, in 1855. Resident of Jefferson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Household owned six enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860. Grocer in Louisville in 1863.

ab.bibl:

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 1, p. 225B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Jeffersontown, p. 356A.
